sections.heading: Judges; when ineligible as candidates for other offices
sections.text: No judge shall be eligible as a candidate for any office except a judicial office during the time he or she is serving as a judge.SourceLaws 1911, c. 37, § 1, p. 204;R.S.1913, § 1139;C.S.1922, § 1068;C.S.1929, § 27-203;R.S.1943, § 24-203;R.S.19
